comment.author: 69587809@N05
comment._content: Valentia Island is in the background and a bridge was opened between Portmagee and Valentia in 1971. Valentia in the title seems a little misleading.  Everybody knows each other in both places; but one wouldn't want to persuade them that they are one and the same.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/mosskayree] One certainly would not! Title changed now, and I'll try to remember to change it in our catalogue too. Again, that was from the original Lawrence information.
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
